meanings.definition: A unit of digital information equal to one sextillion (10^21) bytes.
meanings.sent1: The company's server can store zettabytes of data.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the zettabytes of information needed for the project.
meanings.sent3: I have so many photos on my phone, it feels like a zettabytes worth!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a zettabytes hard drive, storing every detail of the event.
meanings.sent5: The library contained a zettabytes of knowledge waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: The total amount of digital data in existence.
meanings.sent1: The zettabytes of information on the internet is mind-boggling.
meanings.sent2: Experts predict that the world will soon reach zettabytes of data.
meanings.sent3: I have so many files on my computer, it's like a zettabytes jungle!
meanings.sent4: The data center was a zettabytes ocean of information flowing endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The growth of digital data is like a zettabytes avalanche, unstoppable and vast.
